osvSchema.details: There is a reflected cross site scripting vulnerability in the home application in Esri Portal for ArcGIS 11.1 and below on Windows and Linux that allows a remote, unauthenticated attacker to create a crafted link which when clicked could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victim’s browser.

description_data.value:
** REJECT ** 
This CVE ID has been rejected or withdrawn by its CVE Numbering Authority because this item is scheduled to be patched at a future time.
